sect1.title: VMDP Certification
sect1.para: VMDP has been certified by Microsoft:

sect2.title: WHQL
sect2.para: VMDP has passed WHQL certification. See for more information.

sect2.title: SVVP
sect2.para: The SVVP program has validated our VMDP paravirtualized drivers. Thus, Microsoft customers running copies of Windows* Server they have acquired and licensed from Microsoft directly can receive technical support for Windows* Server in virtualized environments. See for more information.
